entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11 except 16 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11 except 16 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 6 May 2023
